meta.job_title: White Collar Defense & Investigations Associate Attorney

duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently managing and responding to grand jury subpoenas, assisting in defendant or witness proffers before the Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission.
Drafting all pleadings, motions, and briefs for White Collar Defense & Investigations cases.
Conducting legal research and providing advice and support to clients in response to government investigations.
Defending depositions and proffers before the Department of Justice.

education_certification.credential: JD from an accredited law school
